abstracts.cdata!:
The First Structural Adjustment Loan
            Project will make $15 million equivalent available to the
            Bank of Mauritius to finance imports of essential goods,
            mainly for use in the industrial and agricultural sectors,
            so as to allow economic growth and investment to be
            maintained. It will thus support Mauritius in carrying out a
            medium-term program of structural adjustment of its economy,
            aimed at developing export earnings in industry, sugar and
            tourism, at increasing the economic return to be derived
            from the public sector investment program, and at improving
            efficiency in certain key areas of public expenditure.
